item.title: Seeking Paradise - Mell O D (Genre?)
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
An interesting piece. Liked.

Even though it’s relatively short (3:09), I’m wondering if there could be a ‘B Section’ in there, where you change the feel/energy for a spell.
The energy level feels pretty constant throughout, so inserting a mid-section that either increases or decreases the energy level can give the piece a bit more internal character.

 
Not sure what genre it will fall under, at least, within Electronic.

It’s worth tagging it as Electronic on SC, at least.
It’s easy to assume that everything coming out of the forum is some form of Electronic music, but outside of here, listeners and algorithms need to be told.

That’s my 2¢ on the genre.

 
Also, it’s worth setting a proper SC Profile URL.

user-89572944 isn’t great.

Read full topic
